SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

hardwareAbstraction
Interface RemoteCommands

All Known Implementing Classes:
NXTRemoteControl, NXTRemoteMotor, NXTRemoteUltrasonicPoller
public interface RemoteCommands

Contains a list of integer commands to communicate to the NXTRemoteMotor and NXTRemoteUltrasonicPoller.

0-49 is reserved for RemoteMotor. These commands correspond to the available methods of the NXTRegulatedMotor

50+ is reserved from Remote Ultrasonic Poller. These commands correspond to the available methods of the UltrasonicPoller interface. Code Sourced from Lejos Forums (http://www.lejos.org/forum/viewtopic.php?f=7&t=2620)

Author:
cs07cc4
